theme: Liam is texting his ex-girlfriend, Zoe, after he saw her posting about a new guy on social media. He’s feeling jealous and unsure about whether to confess he still has feelings for her, as their breakup was messy and unresolved.

participant1.name: Liam
participant1.personality: Emotional and conflicted, he tends to overthink and get sentimental in texts. Uses long messages to express his feelings.

participant2.name: Zoe
participant2.personality: Confident and assertive, Zoe is direct in her texts. She rarely sugarcoats things and prefers to keep conversations straightforward.

messages.content: Hey Zoe... saw ur post about that new guy. 😬
Oh? U stalking me now? 😂
Nah, just popped up on my feed. What’s his deal?
Just vibing, we’re having fun. Why?
I mean, it hit different seeing u with someone else.
C'mon, it’s been forever. U good?
Yeah, just... makes me think. Like, about us.
Wym? We ended it for a reason.
I know, but we had some good times, right? 🤷‍♂️
Yeah, but it got messy, like... really messy.
Right, but I still have feelings, tbh. 😬
That’s kinda unexpected. But also, valid.
No no no, don’t be nice. Am I just being cringe?
Nah, being honest is good. But what now, king?
Idk... just wanted to say it. Maybe I regret some stuff.
Regret’s a heavy word, bro. We move on.
True, but... like, I still think about u.
It’s complicated, though. We’re in different places.
Yeah, that’s valid. Just wanted u to know. 🫶🏻
Appreciate the honesty. Seriously.
So, how’s that guy? Like, does he know u?
We’re just having fun, no labels. Chill.
Cool cool... Just wanted to know. No cap.
Fair enough. U good with everything now?
Getting there, I guess. Thanks for listening. ❤️
Always. Just touch grass & focus on u, okay?
Bet! I’ll try to vibe more. 😅
Good! Stay awesome, Liam. ✨
You too, Zoe. Take care! ❤️‍🔥
